channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Astronomers spot a rare planet-stripping eruption on a nearby star
item.description: Scientists have finally confirmed a powerful coronal mass ejection from another star, using LOFAR radio data paired with XMM-Newton’s X-ray insights. ...

item.title: Breakthrough shows light can move atoms in 2D semiconductors

item.title: Scientists uncover a massive hidden crater in China that rewrites Earth’s recent history
item.description: A massive, well-preserved impact crater has been uncovered in Guangdong, revealing the signature of a powerful meteorite strike during the Holocene. M...

item.title: Science finally solves a 700-year-old royal murder
item.description: Genetic, isotopic, and forensic evidence has conclusively identified the remains of Duke Béla of Macsó and uncovered remarkable details about his life...

item.title: Scientists uncover hidden atomic process that supercharges propylene production
item.description: Scientists have decoded the atomic-level secrets behind catalysts that turn propane into propylene. Their algorithms reveal unexpected oxide behavior ...
